tileset = "suntemple";
area = "sunTemple4";
areaname = "Sun Temple";
dungeon = "SunTemple";
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:46,y:44,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:52,y:7,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"Red Gate",model:"object",x:44,y:10,type:"switch_gate",colour:"ruby"},{name:"Gold Gate",model:"object",x:54,y:54,type:"switch_gate",colour:"topaz"},{name:"Purple Gate",model:"object",x:54,y:53,type:"switch_gate",colour:"amethyst"},{name:"Blue Gate",model:"object",x:54,y:52,type:"switch_gate",colour:"sapphire"},{name:"Red Keystone",model:"object",x:12,y:56,type:"switch_orb",colour:"ruby"},{name:"Gold Keystone",model:"object",x:23,y:48,type:"switch_orb",colour:"topaz"},{name:"Purple Keystone",model:"object",x:30,y:41,type:"switch_orb",colour:"amethyst"},{name:"Blue Keystone",model:"object",x:40,y:28,type:"switch_orb",colour:"sapphire"},{name:"UP3",model:"area_transition",x:31,y:14,dir:"n",dest:["sunTemple3",31,15],ARROW:"N"},{name:"Sun Door",model:"DOOR8",lock:"key",key:"Sun Key",x:31,y:20,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple3",31,20]},{name:"DOWN",model:"area_transition",x:59,y:56,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple5",6,1],ARROW:"S"},{name:"UP",model:"DOOR8",x:58,y:1,dir:"s",dest:["sunTemple3",58,2]}];
if(GameData.plotVars.ST_REPTOIDS_1 == null)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Reptoid A",model:"reptoid_warrior",x:40,y:14,walkspeed:-2,dir:"n",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_reptoids1",hidden:1});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Reptoid B",model:"reptoid_warrior",x:40,y:15,walkspeed:-2,dir:"n",elem:"EARTH",conv:[["","AAAAAAAAAA"]],hidden:1});
   A_sprites.push({name:"WALK_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:44,y:8,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      GameData.plotVars.ST_REPTOIDS_1 = 1;
      _root.cont["Reptoid A"]._visible = true;
      _root.cont["Reptoid B"]._visible = true;
      _root.freeze = true;
      _root.CUTSCENE = true;
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,-8],["WALK",1,0],["GOTO","w1"],["UNFREEZE"],["TALK","c_reptoids1"]],"Reptoid A",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WALK",0,-9],["GOTO","e1"]],"Reptoid B",true);
   }});
}
if(GameData.plotVars.CLAVIS == null)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Clavis",model:"clave",x:34,y:25,walkspeed:-1,dir:"n",elem:"ETHER",EN:["People","Clavis"],conv:"c_clavis"});
   A_sprites.push({name:"WALK_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:31,y:21,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      _root.playMusic("Clave");
      DO_ACTIONS([["WAIT",50],["WALK",0,1]],"PC",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WAIT",50],["WALK",-1,0],["GOTO","s1"]],"PC3",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WAIT",50],["WALK",1,0],["GOTO","s1"]],"PC4",true);
      DO_ACTIONS([["WAIT",20],["ALERT"],["WAIT",50],["WALK",-3,0],["WALK",0,-2],["UNFREEZE"],["TALK","c_clavis"]],"Clavis",true);
   }});
}
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ1[1]["Solakian Priest Akhmell"])
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Solakian Priest Akhmell",model:"solakian",x:7,y:37,walkspeed:-1,dir:"n",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_ch3sq1"});
}
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ1[1]["Solakian Priest Mohmana"])
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Solakian Priest Mohmana",model:"solakian",x:19,y:7,walkspeed:-1,dir:"n",elem:"WATER",conv:"c_ch3sq1"});
}

foes = MONSTER_TABLES.SUN_TEMPLE;
btlChance = !GameData.plotVars.SUN_WARDSTONE?2:0;

levelrange = MONSTER_LEVELS.SUN_TEMPLE;
musicTrack = "SunTemple";
